body_html:
Ah, I see. The problem is that the configure script needs to be run first (as per the "install from sources" instructions on www.tensorflow.org) I will update the java README to reflect that.

Please run that and let us know if that solves your problem.
body_text:
Ah, I see. The problem is that the configure script needs to be run first (as per the "install from sources" instructions on www.tensorflow.org) I will update the java README to reflect that.
Please run that and let us know if that solves your problem.
body:
Ah, I see. The problem is that the [`configure`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure) script needs to be run first (as per the "[install from sources](https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup#configure_the_installation)" instructions on www.tensorflow.org) I will update the java README to reflect that.

Please run that and let us know if that solves your problem.
